description.dispensary_bio: Margalope, a skunky sativa cross of Chocolope and Frozen Margy, delivers a unique aroma of gas, fruit, and floral notes with a sweet, rich flavor. The energizing effects lean uplifting and may help ease discomfort while keeping the mood bright.
vibes_like: Starting the day with a fruity, gassy spark
Leaning into creative focus without feeling weighed down
Keeping energy upbeat while easing tension
description.product_positioning: Planet 13 Tier 3 flower showcases sun-grown, terpene-rich buds cultivated with hands-on care and modern indoor technology. Each 3.5g pouch highlights the cultivarâ€™s signature aroma and balanced potency for an easygoing sativa session.
description.brand_info: Planet 13 crafts cannabis with a blend of hands-on cultivation and innovative technology to preserve bold terpene profiles. Their indoor conservatories harness natural sunlight to deliver consistent, strain-specific effects.

session_template.suggested_dose_guidance_text: This is a moderate sativa (20.3% THC). Good for daytime creativity and energy. Start with 0.25-0.5g for uplifting effects.
recommended_questions: What method did you use to consume this strain?
About how much did you use?
What time of day was it?
What were you hoping to accomplish or feel?
What positive effects did you experience?
Any negative effects or side effects?
How would you rate the intensity on a scale of 1-10?
Did this strain help you achieve your goals?
Would you use Margalope again for similar situations?

disclaimers: This information is provided for general informational purposes only and is not intended as medical advice.
Terpene and cannabinoid profiles are commonly associated with certain characteristics but individual experiences may differ.
Effects and experiences may vary by individual. Start with a low dose and wait to understand your personal response.

comparative_context.genetics_origin: Created by Cannarado Genetics crossing DNA Genetics' Chocolope (Chocolate Thai x Cannalope Haze) with Cannarado's Frozen Margy. Released as seed, allowing multiple cultivators to grow it.
market_availability: Florida (Planet 13 - Tier 3 flower, pre-rolls, vape cartridges)
Illinois (The Botanist/GTI, Revolution Cannabis, Curaleaf - flower and live resin)
Nevada/California (likely via Planet 13's Las Vegas operations)
Ohio and Maryland (reported via GTI/Curaleaf operations)
distinguishing_characteristics: Terpene-rich profile - some producers report 3-4% total terpenes (Illinois batches)
Unique 'skunky tropical fruit' aroma with chocolate undertones
Moderate THC (16-25% range, FL Tier 3 at ~16.9%) but robust terpene expression
Planet 13's Tier 3 designation indicates sun-grown indoor cultivation with natural sunlight assist
Extra-large, sugar-coated buds characteristic of the strain
medical_therapeutic_notes: Energizing, clear-headed lift suitable for daytime use
Creative focus and mood elevation without anxiety
Light body relaxation that eases muscle tension without sedation
Effective for chronic stress, depression, pain, and PTSD
Balanced sativa-indica effects - 'creative euphoria without the crash'
Note: Terpinolene can cause mild stimulation/racing in sensitive users at higher doses

comparison_highlights.vs_white_sunshine: Margalope is more sativa-leaning with pronounced creative/energizing effects, while White Sunshine offers hybrid balance
comparison_highlights.vs_juicy_jane: Margalope emphasizes uplifting sativa effects with lower THC but higher terpene character, while Juicy Jane is more potent balanced hybrid

comparative_context.flavor_profile_detail: Sweet and creamy inhale with faint chocolate/cocoa notes, diesel fuel and peppery spice on exhale, with tangy fruit and floral touches throughout
